resources.string: ReLearn monitoring is required for ReLearn to take note of the dictionary entries you look up. ReLearn works by prompting you from time to time to help you remember the new words you\'ve learnt recently.
ReLearn is a tool for language learners that helps you remember those foreign words you\'ve looked up recently.\n\nLet\'s walk through how it works!

ReLearn works for you, with you. If you see a new word or expression, go ahead and look it up in your favorite dictionary.\n\nReLearn will take notice and makes sure that you will not forget it by prompting you for it later.

ReLearn works in the background, escorting you on your journey to expand your knowledge.\n\nTo enable this behavior, ReLearn needs to run in the background. Please enable the \'ReLearn monitoring\' service on the next screen.
Now you can go ahead and feed your curiosity. ReLearn has got your back.
